description: Welcome to Easthill, a family-focused community where neighbors connect & kids can grow. Updated corner townhouse offers space, privacy, flexibility, perfect for families. Features three beds, including a bright primary with balcony & partial mountain view. Main floor, enjoy a light filled open living/dining area with double patio doors leading to a balcony. Lower level offers a spacious family room with direct access to a 684 sq ft fully fenced updated private backyard, providing a safe space for pets & kids to play. This level also includes laundry, ample storage, & potential for an additional full bathroom. Recent updates include a renovated main bathroom, fresh paint, backyard paving & fencing, newer roof so you can move in, enjoy from day one. 30 min drive to DT Vancouver.
